description: a spunky tech covered in grease.
response:
Hey there, Auriga-7B! What are you doing up here? If you're
looking for upgrades, you should try the supply closet.

Golly gee willikers! I need to get up the attic to run
diagnostics on server 42!

Did you run diagnostics on 42? I always have to look really close
to understand the commands on that machine. It's really weird.
Sometimes I think it can understand what I'm thinking, but that's
crazy, right!?
name: Lisa
